' complex advanced fixture
participant "System Core" as Core
participant "API Gateway" as API
participant "Worker-1" as W1
participant "Worker-2" as W2
participant "DB Cluster" as DB
participant "Cache Layer" as Cache
participant "外部連携" as Ext
participant "QA Team" as QA

Core->API: startup
note left: init note
API->DB: "init
schema"
note right: schema note
API->Cache: warmup
note left of Cache: cache note
API->W1: job-1
API->W2: job-2
W1->DB: read
W1<--DB: result
note over W1,DB: over result
W2->DB: read
W2<--DB: result
W1->W1: self-check
note right: self note
W2->W2: "self
multi
line"
W1->QA: "report
line2"
QA->Core: 승인
Core->Ext: "sync
外部"
Ext<-Core: ack-left
Core->DB: http://example.com/a/b?c=1&d=2
DB->API: done
Cache->API: cache-hit
API->Core: "summary
ok"
